title: Buffay the Vampire Layer
description: Before Sex Toy Story 2, Lawrence of a Labia, and Inspect Her Gadget, Phoebe Buffay takes on Nosferatool as the Vampire Layer.
quote: Buffay, are you going to plunge your stake into my dark places?
altHero: Phoebe Buffay in a leather bodice and giant hair holding a wooden stake
alt1: a low-budget set featuring a coffin surrounded by candles
alt3: Phoebe, mouth agape, holds the wooden stake
alt4: a male vampire sits up on the coffin
